input.sentences: the fifth conference of fancy cellphone stuff was last month .
i work for organization | and we did a big demonstration .
things are advancing fast at our company !
the virtual flower app is one of my favorites .
we also sell laptops | and they are as good as our cell phones .
output.sentences: Every month there's some new fancy display at the convention.
Today the convention hall is booked for a demonstration, put on by a scientificu organization.
Yesterday we had a fast-growing tech company, showcasing its advancing skills with a case of new age products.
One of the apps, among my favorites, was one that created virtual flowers.
Although the display was informationan and to some extent historical there were also sales people available  to sell the laptops  and phones, preferably in large orders.
